CustomField.description: The Lead record associated with this potential duplicate record.
CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK( '/' & SFSSDupeCatcher__Lead__c, SFSSDupeCatcher__Lead__r.FirstName & IF(SFSSDupeCatcher__Lead__r.FirstName <> '', ' ', '' ) & SFSSDupeCatcher__Lead__r.LastName & IF( SFSSDupeCatcher__Lead__r.Company <> '', ' at ' & SFSSDupeCatcher__Lead__r.Company, '' ), '_self' )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Lead record associated with this potential duplicate record.
CustomField.label: Lead Record
